doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Abdul Alim
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Abdul Alim is a Gastroenterologist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), MD (Gastroenterology), FACP (USA). He is a Professor, Gastroenterology at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Labaid Diagnostic, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Abdul Alim at Labaid Diagnostic, Rajshahi is 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: House # 621, Shershah Road, Rajpara, Laxmipur, Rajshahi - 6000

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Khalequzzaman Sarker
doctor.degree: MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Gastroenterology), MD (Gastroenterology), MRCP SCE (UK),FACG (USA), FACP (USA), FRCP (Glasg), FRCP (Ireland), PhD (RU)
doctor.specialty: Gastroenterology, Liver Diseases & Pancreas SpecialistInterventional & Therapeutic Endoscopist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Khalequzzaman Sarker is a highly qualified specialist in gastroenterology, liver diseases, and pancreatic disorders. With an MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Gastroenterology), MD (Gastroenterology), MRCP SCE (UK), FACG (USA), FACP (USA), FRCP (Glasg), FRCP (Ireland), and a PhD from Rajshahi University, he brings extensive expertise to the field. As an Associate Professor of Gastroenterology at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital, he specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of conditions such as liver cirrhosis, hepatitis, fatty liver disease, pancreatitis, gastric ulcers, and inflammatory bowel disease. He is also an expert in interventional and therapeutic endoscopy for complex gastrointestinal issues. Dr. Khalequzzaman Sarker is available for consultation at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi, located at House # 474, Chowdhury Tower, Laxmipur, Rajshahi, from 3 PM to 7 PM (except Fridays).

doctor.name: Dr. Sanjoy Kumar Paul
doctor.info: Dr. Sanjoy Kumar Paul is a dedicated gastroenterology, pancreas, liver, and medicine specialist in Rajshahi. He holds an MBBS degree along with MD in Gastroenterology, MCPS in Medicine, and CCD from Birdem. Currently serving as a Consultant in Gastroenterology at the 250 Beded District Hospital, Chapainawabganj, Dr. Paul provides treatment for a variety of digestive and liver-related conditions such as gastric ulcers, acid reflux, irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), hepatitis, fatty liver, pancreatitis, and liver cirrhosis. He attends to patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi, located at Bhaban â€“ 01, Holding # 617, Laxmipur, Rajshahi. His chamber is open from 4pm to 9pm on Saturday, Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.
